item.description:
Looking to grow your business by becoming a "New Age" dynamo? If so, you may be interested in the Boston Business Symposium.

Join Boston's own Social Media Samurai, Farhana Cannon, as she has invited a few of her 'inner-circle' business colleagues to create a most incredible speaking line-up on October 20, 2012.

Each speaker has promised to share their most desired success secrets and many of the intricacies of their business building system that is keeping them on the 'cutting edge' of what's working now.

(Doors open at 9AM and the the Master of Ceremonies will take the stage at 9:30AM)

Included sessions

Farhana Cannon
Founder, IMediaExposure

Farhana, the master of ceremonies for the event as well as a presenter will be going beyond Social Media 101. By virtue of her marketing efforts for this event alone, she has proven what a solid Social Media marketing strategy is capable of when done correctly!

Berny Dohrmann
CEO, CEO Space, Inc

Berny is going to share proven strategies that will allow you to need less repetition to convert clientele. In other venues, Berny charges several thousands of dollars for folks to gain access to this type of top-tier, executive level guidance.

John Gosselin
Director, The Ally Advertising Group

John has prepared quite the dynamic presentation for this event and promises that all seminar attendees will realize why most marketing doesn't work... John states, "Most marketing works in reverse"...Which is why he's prepared to get us all in "the know."

Joseph Samson
Founder, Samson Law Offices

From entity set-up to maximizing all of the legal "loop-holes" available for folks like us, Attorney Samson will "shine light" on the 3 most overlooked things that we all need to be doing more of if we plan on staying ahead of today's legal world.

Rosemary Meehan Tator
Founder, 2beffective, LLC

Does it feel like you have more to do than you have time to do it? Do you want to gain more control over how your time is spent? Rosemary will provide you with some practices and tips from her award-winning book "More Time For You", that will help you get your arms around it all and "regain" time to spend on your highest priorities....."

How to learn more

To learn more about social media and this event, listen to the webinar hosted by Mark Reinert, featuring Farhana Cannon, "Skyrocket Your Business With Social Media."

Cost and How to Register

Pre-registration and advanced payment is required.

Cost of the event is $49.

Save $10 as member of the Small Business Success Network by using the coupon code "Meetup." Type this code into the box labelled 'Enter promotional code' under the ticket quantity.

Register at this link: http://www.eventbrite.com/event/4290834000/Mark/42685598132
item.name: Boston Business Symposium
